specialAbilities.name: Charge
specialAbilities.description: If the goat moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 10 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

specialAbilities.name: Sure-Footed
specialAbilities.description: The goat has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would knock it prone.

actions.name: Ram
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) bludgeoning damage.
